original_title: Назад - к счастью, или Кто найдет Синюю птицу
overview: Even children know that in the new year the most unusual, most unbelievable events can happen.  Only Masha does not believe in miracles. She has long been accustomed to rely only on her own strength.  December 31, New Year's Eve, and meeting with your loved one - Sergey. The project on which her future career depends.
title: Back - fortunately, or Who will find the Blue Bird
